item.description:
Let do the pitch n putt again - it may be the last round until next season. Sorry had to change the day - Saturday looks like it might be the better day out of the weekend anyway.

Stone Meadown Golf


Let's meet for 1:00 PM and then if anyone is up for it we can grab a bite around the area afterwards.


Please email me if you have any questions!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in by the clubhouse at 12:45 for a 1:00 start

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Stone Meadow Golf
